Package com.islandpower.configurator.service

Class ProjectService

java.lang.Object
com.islandpower.configurator.service.ProjectService
@Service public class ProjectService extends Object
Service class for managing projects and their associated operations. This class provides methods to create, delete, update, and retrieve projects, along with validating user permissions.

    • createProject

      public Project createProject(Project project, String userId)
      Creates a new project and associates it with a user.
      Parameters:
      project - The project object to create
      userId - The ID of the user who owns the project
      Returns:
      com.islandpower.configurator.model.Project The newly created project object

    • deleteProject

      public void deleteProject(String projectId, String userId)
      Deletes an existing project, ensuring the user has the necessary permissions.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project to delete
      userId - The ID of the user performing the deletion

      Returns:
      java.util.List<com.islandpower.configurator.model.Project> A list of all projects

    • getProjectsByUserId

      public List<Project> getProjectsByUserId(String userId)
      Retrieves all projects associated with a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user whose projects to retrieve
      Returns:
      java.util.List<com.islandpower.configurator.model.Project> A list of projects associated with the user

    • getProjectById

      public Project getProjectById(String projectId, String userId)
      Retrieves a project by its ID, ensuring the user has permission to access it.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project to retrieve
      userId - The ID of the user requesting the project
      Returns:
      com.islandpower.configurator.model.Project The requested project
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the project is not found or the user lacks permission

    • updateProject

      public Project updateProject(String projectId, Project updatedProject, String userId)
      Updates an existing project, ensuring the user has permission to modify it.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project to update
      updatedProject - The updated project object
      userId - The ID of the user making the update
      Returns:
      Project The updated project

    • updateSiteWithLocationData

      public void updateSiteWithLocationData(String projectId, String userId, double latitude, double longitude, double[] minMaxTemperatures, int panelAngle, int panelAspect, boolean usedOptimalValues, List<Site.MonthlyData> monthlyData)
      Updates the site information for a project, including location data.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project to update
      userId - The ID of the user performing the update
      latitude - The latitude of the project location
      longitude - The longitude of the project location
      minMaxTemperatures - The minimum and maximum temperatures for the site
      panelAngle - The angle of the solar panels
      panelAspect - The aspect (orientation) of the solar panels
      usedOptimalValues - Whether optimal values were used for the configuration
      monthlyData - The monthly solar irradiance and temperature data

    • updateLastCompletedStep

      public void updateLastCompletedStep(String projectId, int step)
      Updates the last completed step in the project.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project
      step - The step number to set as the last completed step
